sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Cart = ({orderDetails }) => { const {shipping_charge, discount_in_percent} = orderDetails; const cartItems = useSelector(state => state.cart.items); const totalCost = cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price, 0); const dispatch = useDispatch(); console.log(cartItems); const changeQty = (qty, item, id) => { const oldItmes = [...cartItems]; const newItem = {item, qty: qty} const itemIndex = cartItems.findIndex((item) => item.id === id); oldItmes[itemIndex] = newItem; dispatch({ type: 'CHANGE_QTY', payload: oldItmes, }) console.log(cartItems); } return (
{ cartItems?.length > 0 ?
{ cartItems.map((item) => { return (
{item.name}

${item.price}

Qty: 2

Quatity
) }) }
:

Empty Cart

}

Order Total

items ${totalCost}
Shipping ${orderDetails.shipping_charge}
Discount({discount_in_percent}%) -${totalCost * discount_in_percent/100}
Total ${totalCost - totalCost * discount_in_percent/100 + shipping_charge}
Pay Now
) } export default Cart
